item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Cafe shop
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" full_height="yes" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1507697007018{background-color: #cea352 !important;}" bb_sm_mode="yes"][vc_column bbsm_scene="parallax-01" bb_sm_mode="yes"][scrollmagic_imagegroup align="center" bb_sm_mode="no"][scrollmagic_image image="3357"][/scrollmagic_image][/scrollmagic_imagegroup][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1507744803750{background-color: #e3e1d2 !important;}"][vc_column][scrollmagic_image bbsm_scene="fixed-top-right" image="3340" bb_sm_mode="yes"][/scrollmagic_image][scrollmagic_image bbsm_scene="fixed-top-left" image="3339" bb_sm_mode="yes"][/scrollmagic_image][scrollmagic_image bbsm_scene="fixed-bottom-right" image="3338" bb_sm_mode="yes"][/scrollmagic_image][scrollmagic_image bbsm_scene="fixed-bottom-left" image="3337" bb_sm_mode="yes"][/scrollmagic_image][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" full_height="yes" equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1507744784547{background-color: #e3e1d2 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading text="CAFÉ FRIDA IS ..." font_container="tag:h1|text_align:left|color:%23395442" use_theme_fonts="yes" bbsm_scene="fade-in-left" bb_sm_mode="yes"][vc_custom_heading text="The cream of the coffee, the endless light and the River as a table neighbor. Welcome to Frida." font_container="tag:div|text_align:left|color:%23395442" use_theme_fonts="yes" bbsm_scene="fade-in-right" bb_sm_mode="yes"][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text="A 100% vegan menu (the first in Mauricie) for the environment, ethics and difference. Local products, seasonal and cooked on the spot. ( www.cowspiracy.com)" font_container="tag:div|text_align:left|color:%23395442" use_theme_fonts="yes" bbsm_scene="fade-in-left" bb_sm_mode="yes"][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text="A cafe 3 rd eco-wave and more than fair at the human level. A relationship between the gathered grain and your cup that passes by the proximity with the coffee producers to the worry of a perfect roasting of these batches coming from unique orgines and an infusion made with precision by our baristas. ( www.philsebastian.com )" font_container="tag:div|text_align:left|color:%23395442" use_theme_fonts="yes" bbsm_scene="fade-in-right" bb_sm_mode="yes"][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text="Handcrafted products, nothing machined, from your cocktail to your loaf of bread.
